> **Maintainer note:** Keep security reporting placeholders synchronized across `.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/config.yml` and `.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/bug_report.md`.
> Placeholders: `ORG/REPO`, `security-contact@company.com`, and `docs/security.md` path.

## ⚠️ Before You Submit

If this is a real or suspected vulnerability, do **not** include exploit code, secrets,
or sensitive system details in a public issue.

Use one of the private reporting channels below:

- Private Security Vulnerability Report: https://github.com/ORG/REPO/security/advisories/new
- Security Policy: https://github.com/ORG/REPO/blob/main/docs/security.md
- Security Contact (Email): mailto:security-contact@company.com
